item.title: Diabetes in COVID-19: Prevalence, pathophysiology, prognosis and practical considerations.

Estimation of effects of nationwide lockdown for containing coronavirus infection on worsening of glycosylated haemoglobin and increase in diabetes-related complications: A simulation model using multivariate regression analysis.
Hydroxychloroquine in patients with COVID-19: A Systematic Review and meta-analysis.
Remdesivir in COVID-19: A critical review of pharmacology, pre-clinical and clinical studies.

Contentious issues and evolving concepts in the clinical presentation and management of patients with COVID-19 infectionwith reference to use of therapeutic and other drugs used in Co-morbid diseases (Hypertension, diabetes etc).
Chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine in the treatment of COVID-19 with or without diabetes: A systematic search and a narrative review with a special reference to India and other developing countries.
